page.title: 09Restaurant
page.content:
My name is Kabir. My dad owns an Indian Restaurant in Seaside. It is called New Mum Tajmahal. It is very busy in the summer and at weekends. It also sells wines. A set meal costs Â£12.
A set meal is a starter - lentil soup followed by a{birany}curry or a { {tandoori} curry (which is baked in a clay oven) or the hottest curry a { {vindaloo}followed by waffles. An ordinary curry including rice and chutney costs about Â£3.
Dad gets up at about 10 a.m. The restaurant is open from 12:00 until 2:30 p.m. and from 6:00 p.m. until 12:00 p.m. People often book a table in advance. There are 2 full-time and 1 part-time cooks includng my dad.
